title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 2ยง 16.3 - Filing of account papers
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 2ยง 16.3 - Filing of account papers

State Regulations

Original time and payroll records, delivery receipts, inspection reports evidencing receipt of goods, copies of purchase orders and
vendor vouchers, property records, postage records, bank statements, deposit
slips, paid and spoiled checks, and other papers relating to receipts and
payments subject to field audit shall be so filed as to be readily accessible
to field auditors. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 2ยง
16.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
